quote: 創新區分了領導者和追隨者。(Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.)
author: 史蒂夫·賈伯斯 (Steve Jobs)
work: 《商業周刊》訪談 (BusinessWeek Interview, 2004)

quote: 我認為普通人有可能選擇成為不平凡的人。(I think it is possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.)
author: 伊隆·馬斯克 (Elon Musk)
work: 公開演講

quote: 求知若飢，虛心若愚。(Stay hungry. Stay foolish.)
author: 史蒂夫·賈伯斯 (Steve Jobs)
work: 史丹佛大學畢業典禮演講 (Stanford Commencement Address, 2005)

quote: 我們正處於一個新時代的開端，這個時代將重新定義人之所以為人的意義。(We are at the beginning of a new era, an era that will redefine what it means to be human.)
author: 李開復 (Kai-Fu Lee)
work: 關於人工智能的論述

quote: 如果你想造一艘船，不要抓一批人來蒐集材料，不要指揮他們做這個做那個，你只要教他們如何渴望浩瀚的大海就行了。(If you want to build a ship, don't drum up people to collect wood and don't assign them tasks and work, but rather teach them to long for the endless immensity of the sea.)
author: 安托萬·德·聖修伯里 (Antoine de Saint-Exupéry)
work: 《小王子》作者，常用於描述願景驅動

quote: 失敗是一個選項。如果事情沒有失敗，那就表示你還不夠創新。(Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.)
author: 伊隆·馬斯克 (Elon Musk)
work: SpaceX相關言論

quote: 未來已來，只是尚未均勻分佈。(The future is already here – it's just not evenly distributed.)
author: 威廉·吉布森 (William Gibson)
work: 科幻作家，常被科技界引用

quote: 專注於訊號，忽略噪音。(Focus on signal over noise.)
author: 伊隆·馬斯克 (Elon Musk)
work: 關於資訊處理和決策的建議

quote: 代碼就是法律。(Code is law.)
author: 勞倫斯·萊斯格 (Lawrence Lessig)
work: 哈佛大學法學教授，討論網路治理

quote: 我們高估了未來兩年內將發生的變化，卻低估了未來十年內將發生的變化。不要讓自己陷入無所作為的境地。(We always overestimate the change that will occur in the next two years and underestimate the change that will occur in the next ten. Don't let yourself be lulled into inaction.)
author: 比爾·蓋茲 (Bill Gates)
work: 《未來之路》 (The Road Ahead)

quote: 簡單可能比複雜更難：你必須努力工作，讓你的思想變得清晰，才能使它變得簡單。但最終這是值得的，因為一旦你做到了，你就能移山倒海。(Simple can be harder than complex: You have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple. But it’s worth it in the end because once you get there, you can move mountains.)
author: 史蒂夫·賈伯斯 (Steve Jobs)
work: 《商業周刊》訪談 (BusinessWeek Interview, 1998)

quote: 唯一不變的就是變化本身。(The only constant is change.)
author: 赫拉克利特 (Heraclitus)
work: 古希臘哲學家，常被現代科技和商業引用以強調適應性

quote: 客戶不會告訴你他們想要什麼，他們只會告訴你他們的問題是什麼。(Customers don't tell you what they want, they tell you what their problems are.)
author: 雷德·霍夫曼 (Reid Hoffman)
work: LinkedIn 聯合創始人，關於產品開發

quote: 如果你做的每件事都需要獲得所有人的同意，那麼你可能做不出任何真正創新的事情。(If you do everything that everyone else does in business, you're going to lose. The only way to really be ahead is to 'be different'.)
author: 拉里·埃里森 (Larry Ellison)
work: Oracle 創始人 (這句話的英文原文更強調差異化，中文翻譯稍有不同，但意境相似)

quote: 最好的預測未來方法就是去創造未來。(The best way to predict the future is to create it.)
author: 彼得·杜拉克 (Peter Drucker) / 亞伯拉罕·林肯 (Abraham Lincoln)
work: 這句話被歸功於多人，但其精神與科技創新高度契合

quote: 如果你不願意擁抱變化，那麼等待你的只有被淘汰。(If you don't embrace change, you're going to be left behind.)
author: 安迪·葛洛夫 (Andy Grove)
work: 英特爾前CEO，《只有偏執狂才能生存》作者

quote: 我們之所以在這裡，是要在宇宙中留下印記。不然，何必來這一遭呢？(We're here to put a dent in the universe. Otherwise why else even be here?)
author: 史蒂夫·賈伯斯 (Steve Jobs)
work: 早期蘋果公司內部會議

quote: 對我來說，重要的是我們正在做的事情是否能夠真正地改善人們的生活。(What's important to me is that we're doing things that will actually improve people's lives.)
author: 拉里·佩奇 (Larry Page)
work: Google 聯合創始人

quote: 發明就是將金錢轉化為知識的過程，創新則是將知識轉化為金錢的過程。(Invention is the conversion of cash into ideas. Innovation is the conversion of ideas into cash.)
author: 不詳 (常被引用於創新管理領域)
work: 管理學概念

quote: 人工智慧是我們這個時代最重要的技術之一，它有潛力解決人類面臨的一些最大挑戰。(AI is one of the most important things humanity is working on. It is more profound than, I dunno, electricity or fire.)
author: 桑達爾·皮查伊 (Sundar Pichai)
work: Google CEO

quote: 如果你想取得非凡的成就，就不要模仿別人。(If you want to achieve something great, stop asking for permission.)
author: 不詳 (常被創業圈引用，原文更強調無需許可)
work: 創業精神

quote: 軟體正在吞噬世界。(Software is eating the world.)
author: 馬克·安德森 (Marc Andreessen)
work: 網景創始人，知名投資人，2011年《華爾街日報》文章標題

quote: 我們需要的是不斷學習、不斷進化，並且敢於在未知中探索。(We need to be constantly learning, constantly evolving, and comfortable with a lot of unknown.)
author: 薩提亞·納德拉 (Satya Nadella)
work: 微軟CEO，關於企業文化轉型

quote: 我對『不可能』這個詞的理解是，還沒有人真正去嘗試過。(My definition of 'impossible' is that no one has seriously tried it yet.)
author: 黃仁勳 (Jensen Huang)
work: NVIDIA 創始人兼CEO

quote: 如果你給人們提供工具，讓他們能夠創造和分享，那麼奇蹟就會發生。(If you give people tools, and they use their natural abilities and their curiosity, they will develop things in ways that will surprise you very much.)
author: 比爾·蓋茲 (Bill Gates)
work: 關於賦能和平台的思考

quote: 不要害怕追求那些看起來瘋狂的想法，因為它們往往能帶來最大的突破。(Don't be afraid to pursue ideas that seem crazy, because those are often the ones that lead to the biggest breakthroughs.)
author: 謝爾蓋·布林 (Sergey Brin)
work: Google 聯合創始人

quote: 唯一比錯誤更糟糕的事情是不從錯誤中學習。(The only thing worse than a mistake is not learning from it.)
author: 艾瑞克·萊斯 (Eric Ries)
work: 《精實創業》(The Lean Startup) 作者

quote: 我們必須擁抱技術，並確保它為善服務，而不是相反。(We have to embrace technology and ensure it works for good, not the other way around.)
author: 提姆·庫克 (Tim Cook)
work: 蘋果CEO，常強調科技的責任與隱私

quote: 如果你想走得快，就獨自前行；如果你想走得遠，就結伴同行。(If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.)
author: 非洲諺語 (African Proverb)
work: 常被科技和創業領域引用以強調團隊合作的重要性

quote: 世界是由那些『為什麼不呢？』的人推動的，而不是那些『為什麼？』的人。(The world is moved by those who ask 'Why not?' not by those who ask 'Why?')
author: 蕭伯納 (George Bernard Shaw)
work: 劇作家，其思想啟發創新者
